QuestData.Title: Rustbolt Gramophone
QuestData.Description:
<The large gramophone that you crafted is capable of blasting music across all of Rustbolt.
Now, you just need to find a good place to install it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Install the gramophone in the Rustbolt bar, The Tipsy Tinkerer.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Install the gramophone in the Rustbolt bar, The Tipsy Tinkerer.
